name: accessionNumberSUSMirri
displayName: Unique identifier of the strain in the CC.

name: organismTypeSUSMirri
displayName: The organism type of the microorganism

name: speciesSUSMirri
displayName: The species of the strain followed, when appropriate, by the subspecies name. For hybrid strains, more than one species can be specified. The semicolon “;” must be used as a separation character.
